SEARCH
Package Client.View.Gui.Scene

Class LivingRoom

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Scene
Client.View.Gui.Scene.LivingRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class LivingRoom extends javafx.scene.Scene
The `LivingRoom` class represents the scene that is displayed at the end of the game, showing the final rankings of the players. It extends the JavaFX `Scene` class and provides a UI to display the game state and interacts with the player.
